snippet.title: The Lost Art of Innkeeping game trailer
snippet.description:
Game website: https://seaphoenix.itch.io/LostArt (price: US$4.99)
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SeaPhoenixGames

The good news is that you've just inherited Cascade Manor from your eccentric Aunt Agatha. The bad news is that the manor is in a dismal condition and you have no money to pay for repairs and its upkeep. The even worse news is that you have thirty days to pay off the loan that Aunt Agatha took out shortly before her death, or the bank will seize the manor.

You decide to convert the manor to an inn, but while you’re busy trying to satisfy the needs of your unusual and persnickety guests, you discover that there is more to the manor than meets the eye...

Release date: May 8, 2020
Game developer: SeaPhoenix
Music: J.C. Brickston
